sentences: Tikkimismaterjal ja apretuur on ka väga pesukindlad.
context: The word 'kaota' appears to be part of the compound Estonian word 'pesukindel', which means colorfast or wash-fast. This refers to materials, fabrics, or dyes that do not lose their color or appearance when washed. The word describes textiles and colors that maintain their original quality through washing processes.
